content.text:
# Austin Film Critics Association Awards 2019

15th AFCA Awards
----
Best Film:
Parasite
The 15th Austin Film Critics Association Awards, honoring the best in filmmaking for 2019, were announced on January 7, 2020.
Winners and nominees
{| class=wikitable style="width=100%"
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Film
!style="width=50%"|Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
# Parasite
# Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
# Uncut Gems
# Marriage Story
# The Irishman
# The Farewell
# Knives Out
# Jojo Rabbit
# 1917
# Portrait of a Lady on Fire
| valign="top" |
* 'Bong Joon-ho – Parasite'
** Greta Gerwig – Little Women
** Josh Safdie and Benny Safdie – Uncut Gems
** Martin Scorsese – The Irishman
** Quentin Tarantino – Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Actor
!style="width=50%"|Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Adam Sandler – Uncut Gems'
** Antonio Banderas – Pain and Glory
** Leonardo DiCaprio – Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
** Adam Driver – Marriage Story
** Eddie Murphy – Dolemite Is My Name
| valign="top" |
* '''Lupita Nyong'o – Us'
** Awkwafina – The Farewell
** Scarlett Johansson – Marriage Story
** Elisabeth Moss – Her Smell
** Renée Zellweger – Judy
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Supporting Actor
!style="width=50%"|Best Supporting Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Brad Pitt – Once Upon a Time in Hollywood'
** Willem Dafoe – The Lighthouse
** Al Pacino – The Irishman
** Joe Pesci – The Irishman
** Song Kang-ho – Parasite
| valign="top" |
* 'Jennifer Lopez – Hustlers'
** Laura Dern – Marriage Story
** Adèle Haenel – Portrait of a Lady on Fire
** Scarlett Johansson – Jojo Rabbit
** Florence Pugh – Little Women
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Original Screenplay
!style="width=50%"|Best Adapted Screenplay
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Parasite – Bong Joon-ho and Han Jin-won'
** Knives Out – Rian Johnson
** Marriage Story - Noah Baumbach
** Once Upon a Time in Hollywood – Quentin Tarantino
** Us – Jordan Peele
| valign="top" |
* 'Little Women – Greta Gerwig'
** A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood – Micah Fitzerman-Blue and Noah Harpster
** Hustlers – Lorene Scafaria
** The Irishman – Steven Zaillian
** Jojo Rabbit – Taika Waititi
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Film Editing
!style="width=50%"|Best Ensemble
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Uncut Gems - Ronald Bronstein and Benny Safdie'
** 1917 - Lee Smith
** The Irishman - Thelma Schoonmaker
** Once Upon a Time in Hollywood – Fred Raskin
** Parasite – Yang Jin-mo
| valign="top" |
* Knives Out
** The Irishman
** Little Women
** Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
** Parasite
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Animated Film
!style="width=50%"|Best Foreign Language Film
|-
| valign="top" |
* I Lost My Body
** Frozen 2
** Klaus
** Missing Link
** Toy Story 4
| valign="top" |
* Parasite
** Atlantics
** One Cut of the Dead
** Pain and Glory
** Portrait of a Lady on Fire
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best First Film
!style="width=50%"|Best Documentary
|-
| valign="top" |
* Booksmart
** Atlantics
** The Last Black Man in San Francisco
** The Peanut Butter Falcon
** Queen & Slim
| valign="top" |
* Apollo 11
** The Biggest Little Farm
** For Sama
** Hail Satan?
** One Child Nation
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Cinematography

|-

* '1917 – Roger Deakins'
** Ad Astra – Hoyte van Hoytema
** The Lighthouse – Jarin Blaschke
** Once Upon a Time in Hollywood – Robert Richardson
** Parasite – Hong Kyung-pyo
| valign="top" |
* '1917 – Thomas Newman'
** Little Women – Alexandre Desplat
** Marriage Story – Randy Newman
** Us – Michael Abels
** Waves – Trent Reznor and Atticus Ross
|-
!style="width=50%"|Best Stunts
!style="width=50%"|Best Motion Capture/Special Effects Performance
|-
| valign="top" |
* John Wick: Chapter 3 – Parabellum
** Avengers: Endgame
** Ford v Ferrari
** Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
** Shadow
| valign="top" |
* 'Josh Brolin - Avengers: Endgame'
** Mark Ruffalo - Avengers: Endgame
** Rosa Salazar - Alita: Battle Angel
** Will Smith - Aladdin
** Will Smith - Gemini Man
|-
!style="width=50%"|Bobby McCurdy Memorial Breakthrough Artist Award
!style="width=50%"|Austin Film Award
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Florence Pugh – Midsommar, Little Women and Fighting with My Family'
** Awkwafina – The Farewell
** Noah Jupe – Honey Boy''
** Da'Vine Joy Randolph – Dolemite Is My Name
** Lulu Wang – The Farewell
| valign="top" |
* 'A Hidden Life – Terrence Malick'
** Frances Ferguson – Bob Byington
** The River and the Wall – Ben Masters
** Running with Beto – David Modigliani
** ''Where'd You Go, Bernadette – Richard Linklater
|-
! colspan="2" | Special Honorary Award
|-
| colspan=2 valign="top" width="50%"|
* To Agnès Varda, whose work inspired generations of filmmakers.''
|}
